mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_USER (USER_ID, USER_PW, USER_AREA) VALUES (#{id}, #{pw}, #{area})

SELECT REG_DT AS "date", DETECT_TYPE AS "type", CAMERA_LOC AS "loc", PROG_STATUS AS "prog", DETECT_ID AS "det_id" FROM T_DETECTION

SELECT CAMERA_ID AS camera_id, REGION AS region, GU AS gu, DONG AS dong, INST_PURPOSE AS inst_purpose, INST_DT AS inst_dt, LATITUDE AS latitude, LONGITUDE AS longitude, CAMERA_LOC AS camera_loc FROM T_CAMERA ORDER BY CAMERA_ID

SELECT d.DETECT_ID AS det_id, d.CAMERA_ID AS camera_id, d.DETECT_TYPE AS type, d.PROG_STATUS AS prog, TO_CHAR(d.REG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS date, d.CAMERA_LOC AS loc, c.REGION AS region, c.GU AS gu, c.DONG AS dong, c.INST_PURPOSE AS inst_purpose, c.INST_DT AS inst_dt, c.LATITUDE AS latitude, c.LONGITUDE AS longitude, c.CAMERA_LOC AS camera_loc FROM T_DETECTION d JOIN T_CAMERA c ON c.CAMERA_ID = d.CAMERA_ID WHERE d.DETECT_ID = #{det_id}
